title: Circle Line track fault causing delays

title_translations.zh-Hans: 环线轨道故障导致延误
title_translations.ms: Celah trek Laluan Bulat menyebabkan kelewatan
title_translations.ta: வட்டப் பாதையில் தண்டவாளக் கோளாறு தாமதத்தை ஏற்படுத்துகிறது

updates.text: [CCL] CLEARED: Train services from #PayaLebar towards #MacPherson are now operating normally.
[CCL]: Estimate 5mins additional travelling time from #PayaLebar to #MacPherson towards #HarbourFront due to track fault.
